name: SwiftStompClient
summary: STOMP implementation on native WebSocket in Swift
description: Swift [STOMP](https://stomp.github.io) client for swift via [WebSocketTask](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/foundation/urlsessionwebsockettask) with [Heart-beating](https://stomp.github.io/stomp-specification-1.2.html#Heart-beating) iOS 15.0+ macOS 12.0+ tvOS 15.0+ watchOS 8.0+
